pageContext.claim: “And if you look at U.S. Steel and Nucor -- Nucor just announced a billion-dollar plant -- brand new.”
pageContext.analysis: Nucor announced its plan to invest in February of 2017. In other words, they announced it well over a year ago — well before Trump announced steel tariffs. There is no evidence of a planned $750 million investment. Nucor did announce plans to build a $240 million dollar plant.
